1、Entry into the project directory <br/>
cd lession2

2、Using the truffle framework to compile and deploy<br/>
$ truffle compile<br/>
$ truffle migrate --reset<br/>

3、Interaction with contracts<br/>
$ truffle console<br/>
HelloWorld.deloyed().then(instance => contract = instance)<br/>
contract.set(234,432)<br/>
contract.get()<br/>


4、return values<br/>
{ tx: '0x9de5acae66cc03848d235256989362ebc60030fecfe68c8c4780b3ea88abd840',
  receipt: 
   { transactionHash: '0x9de5acae66cc03848d235256989362ebc60030fecfe68c8c4780b3ea88abd840',
     transactionIndex: 0,
     blockHash: '0xec32a9352bbf936776c90a18205fdad2245cc7fb32cd2f585467e15665ba7eb2',
     blockNumber: 15,
     gasUsed: 61968,
     cumulativeGasUsed: 61968,
     contractAddress: null,
     logs: [],
     status: '0x01',
     logsBloom: '' },
  logs: [] }<br/>
